TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TableRowsCollectionEditor extends System.ComponentModel.Design.CollectionEditor

Docs.summary: Provides a user interface for editing rows of a table.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following code example uses the <xref:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute> to associate the `TableRowsCollectionEditor` class and the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor> class (the collection editor's base class) with a custom `TestRows` property.
[!code-csharp[Design.WebControls_CollectionEditorSamples#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Design.WebControls_CollectionEditorSamples/CS/WebControlDesignerCollectionEditors.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Design.WebControls_CollectionEditorSamples#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Design.WebControls_CollectionEditorSamples/VB/webcontroldesignercollectioneditors.vb#2)]
